title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, Appendices, app B-2
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, Appendices, app B-2

ATHLETIC TITLES
(cf. Part 335)
(i) Division I Campuses - Athletic Director and Staff

Division I Director of Athletics/Athletic Director

Division I Associate Athletic Director

Division I Senior Assistant Athletic Director

Division I Assistant Athletic Director

Development

Division I Athletic Marketing Director

Division I Athletic University Relations Director
(ii)

Division I Revenue Producing

Sports - Coaching Titles

Division I Head Football Coach (RP)[FN*]
Division I Head Basketball Coach (RP)

Division I Associate Head Coach (RP)

Division I Associate Coach (RP)

Division I Football Defensive Coordinator (RP)

Division I Assistant Head Coach (RP)

Division I Assistant Coach (RP)

- Coaching Titles

Division I Head Coach

Director of Athletics

[FN*] RP indicates revenue producing sports

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
